description.short: World's most downloaded food & beverage app serving 100M+ users across 60+ countries.
description.full: The McDonald's Global Mobile App (GMAL) serves customers worldwide with ordering, payments, delivery, and loyalty features. I worked on MDS (Delivery) and Payments feature streams, implementing KMP shared libraries for both Android and iOS. Designed architecture for 20+ payment providers (Adyen, Mastercard, Cybersource) and delivery integrations (Loginext). Led ViewBinding migration using IntelliJ SSR tooling, created Android Talks initiative, and established gmal-lite-rc Slack channel for improved release process.

achievements.title: Payments System Architecture & Implementation
achievements.problem: Need to support 20+ different payment providers across multiple countries.
achievements.solution: Designed flexible architecture and implemented shared KMP library for business logic with Adyen, Mastercard, and Cybersource PSP integrations.
details: Designed architecture for 20+ payment provider integrations
Shared KMP (Kotlin Multiplatform) library for business logic (Android + iOS)
PSP integrations: Adyen, Mastercard, Cybersource (CYBS)
Android app integration with shared library
First 5 payment integrations implemented
Comprehensive documentation for iOS team
Full test coverage with QA team (Ann Humeniuk)

achievements.title: MDS (Delivery) Feature Architecture
achievements.problem: Different countries require different maps, address formats, delivery tracking providers.
achievements.solution: Designed flexible architecture for 20+ market variations with Loginext delivery tracking integration.
details: MDS (McDonald's Delivery Service) feature stream

Implemented shared KMP library for delivery logic (Android + iOS)

achievements.title: ViewBinding Migration with IntelliJ SSR
achievements.problem: Kotlin Synthetics deprecated, mandatory migration to ViewBinding before Kotlin 1.8.
achievements.solution: Led migration using IntelliJ Structural Search Replace (SSR) tooling for automated refactoring of AdapterDelegates and ViewHolders.
details: Created SSR templates for automated ViewBinding migration
Migrated AdapterDelegates library patterns
onCreateViewHolder refactoring with binding inflation

Custom Inspection from Template for lint suggestions
Documented migration process for team
